DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate effectiveness counsel pain , function well-fare outcome management patient temporomandibular disorder ( TMD ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Counseling Program Temporomandibular Disorders ( TMD ) Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: In study , 51 patient allocate one research group . In Group I , institute counsel therapy . For Group II conduct treatment usual occlusal splint . Patients follow return 7 , 15 , 30 60 day baseline . At baseline , patient examine assessed Research Diagnostic Criteria/Temporomandibular Disorder ( RDC/TMD form ) . In addition , patient refer specific treatment accord group belong . In session , patient also survey pain intensity use Numeric Scale . To analyze impact pain quality life , Oral Health Impact Profile ( OHIP-14 ) questionnaire use .
